forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 63F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 65F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 17C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 44F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
